import React, {useContext} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { context } from "../context/CartContextProvider" import "./cart.css" const Cart =()=>{ const {productsCart, removeProducts} = useContext(context); const total = productsCart.reduce(function(contador,objeto){ return contador + (objeto.price * objeto.amount) },0) return( <> {productsCart.length ===0 ? No hay productos! :

{productsCart.map((product, i)=>{ return
})}
Producto Cantidad Subtotal
{product.title} {product.amount} ${product.price}

Total

${total}

} ) } export default Cart
